metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11543 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
tcpdump 4.9.0 has a buffer overflow in the sliplink_print function in print-sl.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11543` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
